decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s): ST_24_41GOLDSMITHAVE_00 SITE AND LOCATION PLAN; ST_24_41GOLDSMITHAVE_01 Rev C EXISTING GROUND FLOOR & FIRST FLOOR PLAN; ST_24_41GOLDSMITHAVE_02 Rev C EXISTING LOFT FLOOR & ROOF PLAN; ST_24_41GOLDSMITHAVE_03 Rev C EXISTING FRONT & REAR ELEVATION EXISTING SECTION A-A B-B; ST_24_41GOLDSMITHAVE_04 Rev C EXISTING ELEVATIONS A & B; ST_24_41GOLDSMITHAVE_05 Rev C PROPOSED GROUND FLOOR & FIRST FLOOR PLAN; ST_24_41GOLDSMITHAVE_06 Rev C PROPOSED LOFT FLOOR & ROFT PLAN; ST_24_41GOLDSMITHAVE_07 Rev C PROPOSED FRONT & REAR ELEVATION EXISTING SECTION A-A B-B; ST_24_41GOLDSMITHAVE_08 Rev C PROPOSED ELEVATIONS A & B; FIRE SAFETY STRATEGY
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).
| The proposed ^IN; on the side elevations shall contain only obscure glass and only have top openings at a minimum of 1.7m from floor level.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of neighbouring properties in accordance with policies D3 and D6 of the London Plan (2021), policies policy 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and policies 1.1 and 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012). | No part of the roof of the extension shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

Reason:  To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policies D4 and D6 of The London Plan (2021), policies 7.4, 7A & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and policies 1.1 (e)(g), 1.2 (f), 2.1(c) and 2.10 Core Strategy (2012). | The hereby approved three rooflights to front roof slope shall not protrude more than 0.15 metres beyond the plane of the slope of the original roof when measured from the perpendicular with the external surface of the original roof and shall be retained as such for the lifetime of the development.

Reason: To protect the character of the host property and local area, in accordance with Policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021), Policies 7.4 and 7B of Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and Policy DAA of Ealing's draft new Local Plan (Regulation 19).
description: single storey side/rear wraparound extension with patio; excavation of rear garden; roof extension to rear outrigger; and installation of three rooflights to front roofslope (following demolition of existing extensions).
